=== Current Issues ===
Infrared and 5-in-1 card reader is not supported out of the box

=== System Info ===
<pre>
"cd /var/lib/acpi-support/ ; grep . -r *-*" Gives:
bios-version:v1.3221
system-manufacturer:Acer, inc.
system-product-name:TravelMate 4670
system-version:Not Applicable
</pre>

=== Hardware details ===

* Acer Travelmate 4674 WLMI
* Intel® Core™ Duo processor T2500 (2MB L2 cache, 2.0GHz, 667MHz FSB)
* 2048MB Memory (2GB (1/1) DDR2 533 SDRAM)
* Serial ATA HDD 120 GB (5400RPM)
* modular Super-Multi drive (DVD+R, DVD-R, DVD-RAM)
* Acer GridVista™ (128MB, 15.4" screen, 1280*800) 
* ATI Mobility™ Radeon® X1400 with 512 MB of HyperMemory™ 
* V.92 modem
* LAN (Broadcom Corporation NetXtreme BCM5705_2 Gigabit Ethernet (rev 03))
* WLAN (Intel® PRO/Wireless 3945ABG)
* four USB 2.0
* IEEE 1394
* FIR 
* S-video
* external display (VGA) port
* 5-in-1 card (MultiMediaCard, Secure Digital card, Memory Stick, Memory Stick PRO or xD-Picture Card)
* Windows XP Professional
* US Keyboard
